channel.title: I cant drop items on my server! need help
channel.description: ok ya so i cant drop items on my server.... it keeps saying drops disabled and do ::empty to delete inv. any1 help?

item.title: I cant drop items on my server! need help
item.dc:creator: @sirmashni1 sirmashni1
item.description:
@sirmashni1 wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:4, topic:402211”]…No, why would you change the entire source because of one simple problem?
This isn’t a spoonfeeding community. As I said above, look at your DropItem packet. If you actually try, you might fix it.[/quote]

this is only a suggestion because i dont know how many hours i past to find how to allow drop lol well good luck…

Read full topic

item.title: I cant drop items on my server! need help
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

sirmashni1:

lot of people asking this question but i never saw a good answer so just change your source to an other where you can drop… it will be easyer

…No, why would you change the entire source because of one simple problem?
This isn’t a spoonfeeding community. As I said above, look at your DropItem packet. If you actually try, you might fix it.
